segments.text: I enjoy the folk song and dance show very much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad you appreciate our folk music . But a live performance is much more interesting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't wait anymore . When does the performance start ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The show starts at 7 and is over at around 10 o'clock p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( After the show ) It's an excellent musical . The acting was very expressive and the songs and dancing were superb .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad you enjoyed it . It's had long run , but the house has always been full .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think of the leading actors ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Personally I liked the main character . He was true to type .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are a better judge . I don't know the play well enough .
segments.speaker: S1
